saved.note: Success notification message for saving a setting

mirrorMyVideo.note: Label for the button that toggles video mirroring

shareMyMirroredVideo.note: Label for the button that publishes the mirrored video to other participants

simulcast.note: Label for the Simulcast settings toggle button.

noCamerasFound.note: Label displayed in the camera select list when no devices were found.

noMicrophonesFound.note: Label displayed in the microphone select list when no devices were found.

simulcastEnabled.note: Success notification displayed when simulcast has been enabled.

simulcastDisabled.note: Success notification displayed when simulcast has been disabled.

simulcastApplyConfigError.text: Failed to apply new Simulcast configuration
simulcastApplyConfigError.note: Success notification displayed when simulcast config changes were not applied due to re-publish failure.

turnOffIncomingVideo.note: Label for the turn off incoming video toggle button
